title: 获权资源黑市
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:toggle-sidebar]]
[[module css]]
#page-title {
    display: none;
}
.sourcename {
    font-size: 200%;
    text-align: center;
}
.sourcename a {
    color: purple;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.griddle {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
}
.griddleimage {
    grid-column-start: 1;
    grid-column-end: 3;
    grid-row-start: 1;
    grid-row-end: 2;
    border: solid 1px purple;
    min-height: 300px;
}
.mapchart {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/mapchart.png);
    background-size: cover;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
.gameicons {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/gameicons.png);
    filter: brightness(0.5);
    background-size: 100px 100px;
    background-position: center;
}
.mapillary {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/mapillary.png);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}
.fortepan {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/fortepan.png);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}
.eol {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/eol.png);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}
.adorkastock {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/adorkastock.png);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}
.openverse {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/openverse.png);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}
.atlas {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/atlas.png);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}
.creepystock {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/creepystock.png);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}
.griddletextone {
    grid-column-start: 1;
    grid-column-end: 2;
    grid-row-start: 2
    grid-row-end: 3;
    border-bottom: solid 1px purple;
}
.griddletexttwo {
    grid-column-start: 2;
    grid-column-end: 3;
    grid-row-start: 2
    grid-row-end: 3;
    border-bottom: solid 1px purple;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=Fish^12]]
第一篇文章。这是我的[[[hotfish|作者页]]]！
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source end=--]]

嘿，小朋友。

我是[[*user Fish^12]]。想要一些酷炫资源来产出作品吗？你来对地方了。这是兼容[[[licensing-guide|维基授权协议]]]的资源黑市。我先假设你已经了解[[[guia-licencias-de-archivos|维基的授权协议是怎么运作的了]]]。

不管怎样，开始吧。

**译注：**带有🚫符号的网站无法从大陆地区直接访问。

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
🚫 [https://www.mapchart.net/ MapChart]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage mapchart"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**CC BY-SA 4.0

**链接：**[https://www.mapchart.net/ https://www.mapchart.net/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**用于制作高质量地图的在线软件。具备用于架空历史与奇幻世界观的附加功能。有提供更多工具的付费版本。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
🚫 [https://www.mapillary.com// Mapillary]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage mapillary"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**CC BY-SA 3.0，视情况而定

**链接：**[https://www.mapillary.com/ https://www.mapillary.com/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**与MapChart类似，但主打街道级图像库。**请注意，部分图像可能采用NC授权方式，这与维基并不兼容。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[https://game-icons.net// Game Icons]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage gameicons"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**CC BY-SA 3.0，视情况而定

**链接：**[https://game-icons.net/ https://game-icons.net/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**数百个本为电子游戏设计、但也能用于他处的高质量图标。还可使用浏览器内置编辑器进行格式调整，但编辑器功能有限。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[https://www.gutenberg.org/ Project Gutenberg]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage"]]
[[=]]
“Two households, both alike in dignity,
In fair Verona, where we lay our scene,
From ancient grudge break to new mutiny,
Where civil blood makes civil hands unclean.
From forth the fatal loins of these two foes
A pair of star-cross'd lovers take their life;
Whole misadventured piteous overthrows
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**公有领域

**链接：**[https://www.gutenberg.org/ https://www.gutenberg.org/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**查找已进入公有领域的书籍的资源。可用于研究和/或引用。**部分标题[[footnote]]**译注：**原文为“title”。经查网站相关声明，或指常包含出版社商标等信息的标题页，不影响对文本内容的使用。[[/footnote]]可能仍受版权保护。**
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[https://librivox.org/ LibriVox]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage"]]
[[=]]
Do with their death bury their parents' strife.
The fearful passage of their death-mark'd love,
And the continuance of their parents' rage,
Which, but their children's end, nought could remove,
Is now the two hours' traffic of our stage;
The which if you with patient ears attend,
What here shall miss, our toil shall strive to mend.”
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**公有领域

**链接：**[https://librivox.org/ https://librivox.org/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**与Project Gutenberg类似，但聚焦于公有领域有声书。有声书由志愿者们朗读！
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[https://fortepan.eu/ Fortepan]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage fortepan"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**CC BY-SA 3.0

**链接：**[https://fortepan.eu/ https://fortepan.eu/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**欧洲历史图像库，依地点与年份分类。有许多黑白图像。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
@@FreeSound@@[[footnote]]**译注：**Wikidot黑名单网站，请谨慎使用。[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage"]]
[[div style="margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:300px"]]
[[include :snippets:html5player
    |type=audio
    |url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/black-market-licensed-resources/macleod.mp3
]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**视情况而定

**链接：**@@https://freesound.org/@@
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**声效、循环音声与其他声音的综合合集。还出于不明原因内置了一个论坛。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
🚫 [https://openverse.org/ OpenVerse]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage openverse"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**视情况而定

**链接：**[https://openverse.org/ https://openverse.org/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**图像与音频库，极为强调艺术与文化。你能找到许多来自大都会艺术博物馆、萨塔昆塔博物馆和史密森尼博物馆的图像。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[https://eol.org/ Encyclopedia of Life]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage eol"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**CC，视情况而定

**链接：**[https://eol.org/ https://eol.org/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**充满生物学知识的百科全书。包括研究论文、栖息地信息、地图、各类媒体、学名与其他杂项内容。有点杂乱，但非常迷人。**有些图像可能NC，与维基的授权协议不兼容。**
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[https://www.adorkastock.com/ Adorkastock]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage adorkastock"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**CC BY 3.0

**链接：**[https://www.adorkastock.com/ https://www.adorkastock.com/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**艺术家的姿势参考库。它是一个初创的独立网站，所以带有Ko-Fi[[footnote]]**译注：**一个赞助平台。[[/footnote]]，还有一个包含极其具体的姿势主题的商店，货品种类多到见鬼。对体型范围的覆盖也相当不错。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[https://heroicons.com/ heroicons]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage"]]

[[html]]
<div style="text-align:center;">
<svg
  class="size-6 text-gray-500"
  fill="none"
  viewBox=""
  stroke="currentColor"
  stroke-width="2"
  width="24px"
height="24px"
>
  <path
    stroke-linecap="round"
    stroke-linejoin="round"
    d="M12 8v4l3 3m6-3a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"
  />
</svg>
[[/html]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**MIT

**链接：**[https://heroicons.com/ https://heroicons.com/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**小型图标库，能在任何网页设计中添入一丝微妙触感。提供SVG格式。可能是我在这些网站里的最爱，也是我会尝试利用的一个。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[http://atlasoftheuniverse.com/ An Atlas of The Universe]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage atlas"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**CC BY-S.A 2.5

**链接：**[http://atlasoftheuniverse.com/ http://atlasoftheuniverse.com/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**复古图表与详细星座信息的华丽中心。也包含许多链接，指向其他囤积了大量与太空相关的图像的网站，它们2000年代风格的网页设计令人着迷。**但你还是要仔细检查它们的授权协议。**
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="sourcename"]]
[https://creepystock.com/ CreepyStock]
[[/div]]

[[div class="griddle"]]
[[div class="griddleimage creepystock"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletextone"]]
**授权协议：**视情况而定

**链接：**[https://creepystock.com/ https://creepystock.com/]
[[/div]]
[[div class="griddletexttwo"]]
**描述：**让人毛骨悚然、紧张不安的图片合集，整合自多个网站。包含各种恐怖要素：绘画、雕像、服装与环境。搜索系统很简洁，还可以根据授权协议限制搜索结果。**授权协议差异//极大//。确保你使用的任何图像都与维基兼容。**
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

如果你想在此列表中添加其他资源，请留下评论或联系[[*user Fish^12]]。我将决定是否更新列表。

@@ @@

@@ @@

这篇资源旨在详细介绍一些较为小众独特的维基兼容资源，并不意在全面。美国政府组织（例如NASA、DoD和CIA）发布的图像和文档几乎全部属于公有领域。大学（例如MIT、TED和OpenStax）也会免费发布教育材料。科学驱动型组织（例如GEO、MDPI和PLOS）会发布研究论文。

@@ @@

@@ @@

海阔凭鱼跃，CC需署名。

[[div style="margin:400px"]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:license-box
| author = Fish^12
]]
